title: Autodesk Crispin Engineer Pro 2016 SP4 + Crack (x64) [SadeemPC]
description:
Autodesk Crispin Engineer Pro 2016 SP4 Win64

As the process of footwear design transcends to digital, collections are produced more quickly putting even more pressure on pattern engineers to produce patterns more quickly and accurately. With Engineer, you can digitise patterns easily so you can edit them faster and with greater precision. 

Engineer is the international market-leading pattern engineering CAD software used by both worldwide brands and small manufacturers. Years of feedback and development make it the most comprehensive and powerful yet easy-to-use 2D pattern engineering solution. 

We understand that experienced pattern engineers produce new patterns by hand quickly. With Engineer, you can digitise patterns easily so you can edit them faster and with greater precision. Engineer also makes grading and group grading easy so you no longer need to rely on a third party.

Together, these features give you total control over tooling costs and remove the need to make compromises in production so you get your designs to manufacture faster.

Features

1 FAST AND ACCURATE PATTERN CREATION
Drag and drop edge-types onto a net boundary edge to create margins, markers and notches quickly 5 REDUCE TIME CREATING PATTERNS
Open a model you have designed in ShoeMaker to create your 2D pattern automatically

2 MODIFY YOUR DESIGN FASTER AND WITH PRECISION
Update associated pieces such as lining automatically 6 CREATE PARTS INSTANTLY
Create boundaries with a single mouse click

3 MAXIMISE PATTERN PIECE EFFICIENCY
See recommendations of how a pattern piece can be divided or reshaped to increase efficiency 7 CREATE DESIGN VARIATIONS RAPIDLY
Automatically adapt your pattern to fit a new last forme

4 ENSURE ACCURACY EASILY
Output to most cutting systems for prototypes 

Version: 2016 SP4 (v16.1.75)
Homepage: www.delcam.com
OS: 64bit
Language: Multilanguage
